    GroupedErrors._cumulative — Function.
    `_cumulative!(df, xaxis, x) = ecdf(df[x])(xaxis)`

    Cumulative density function of x, computed along xaxis

    GroupedErrors._density — Function.
    `_density(df,xaxis::AbstractRange, x; kwargs...)`

    Kernel density of x, computed along xaxis

    `_density(df, xaxis, x)`

    Normalized histogram of x (which is discrete: every value is its own bin)

    GroupedErrors._hazard — Function.
    `_hazard(df,xaxis, x; kwargs...)`

    Hazard rate of x, computed along xaxis. Keyword arguments are passed to the function computing the density

    GroupedErrors._locreg — Function.
    `_locreg(df, xaxis::AbstractRange, x, y; kwargs...)`

    Apply loess regression, training the regressor with x and y and predicting xaxis

    `_locreg(df, xaxis, x, y; estimator = mean)`

    In the discrete case, the function computes the estimate of y for a given value of x using the function estimator (default is mean)
